TextLibrary.Text: The Dragon Spider chases you away - you will need to continue your search.
You see the Dragon - held fast in a complex looking device something like a large bear trap.
You find no dragons, but a huge Dragon Spider jumps out at you while you are searching.
You must take care of a Dragon in Northern Kor.
You must travel to the Dragonrealm with Flicker and search for any sign of Dragons.
You have defeated the Dragon Spider.
